name: RSAT
description: Generate and/or execute automation files for your test suites using the Regression Suite Automation Tool (RSAT)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of command to be executed through RSAT

inputs.name: rsatLocation
inputs.label: RSAT location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path to root folder of where RSAT is located

inputs.name: rsatSettingsFilePath
inputs.label: RSAT Settings file location
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to RSAT Settings file

inputs.name: download
inputs.label: Download
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag (True or false) indicate whether the test case attachments are downloaded before test automation files are generated

inputs.name: dllOnly
inputs.label: Generate test execution files only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag (True or false) indicate whether the test case attachments are generated together with Excel parameters file

inputs.name: testSuites
inputs.label: Test Suites
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated Names/IDs of test suites

inputs.name: retry
inputs.label: Retry playback if test cases are blocked
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retry playback an extra time if one or more test cases are blocked on the first attempt. A pause is done before retrying playback

inputs.name: retryPause
inputs.label: Retry pause before attempting playback
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pause in seconds before attempting playback

inputs.name: comments
inputs.label: Comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional comment to include with test results
